title: Classic Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and a homemade crust.

title: Spicy Thai Green Curry
summary: Aromatic and rich Thai curry made with green chili, lemongrass, coconut milk, and chicken.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
summary: A hearty lasagna layered with a variety of roasted vegetables, rich tomato sauce, and creamy béchamel.

title: Avocado Sushi Rolls
summary: Traditional Japanese sushi rolls with nori, sushi rice, and fresh avocado, cucumber, and bell pepper.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).

title: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
summary: A simple and elegant dish featuring perfectly grilled salmon served with seasoned asparagus.

title: Summer Berry Pavlova
summary: A light, meringue-based dessert topped with fresh berries and whipped cream, perfect for summer.
